No Poverty.reason: The course covers life and annuity insurance cases, which are financial tools that can provide a safety net and prevent individuals from falling into poverty after unforeseen events.

Good Health and Well-being.reason: The course explicitly includes case analyses of '健康保險' (Health insurance) and '傷害保險' (Accident/Injury insurance), which are directly related to health financing and well-being.

Quality Education.reason: As a university course, its objective is to provide 'advanced professional knowledge in risk management and insurance field', directly contributing to higher education.
evidence: 習得風險管理與保險之相關進階專業知識 (Students will acquire advanced professional knowledge in risk management and insurance field.)
課程目標與學習成效Course Objectives & Learning Outcomes

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course focuses on the insurance industry, a key economic sector, and covers 'risk management' and '企業倫理議題' (business ethics), which are integral to stable economic growth and decent work.
evidence: 理解與辨別社會責任與企業倫理議題 (Students will understand and be able to identify the ethical considerations of business situations.)
兼顧當前保險市場實務與商品發展趨勢

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course explicitly covers '工程保險案例分析' (Engineering insurance case analysis), which is directly tied to infrastructure projects, and discusses '商品設計' (product design), relating to innovation.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: The course includes case analyses of '火災保險' (Fire insurance) and '汽車保險' (Automobile insurance), which are key components of risk management for resilient and safe communities.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: The course aims for students to 'understand and be able to identify the ethical considerations of business situations' and 'social responsibility', which are core to this SDG.
evidence: 理解與辨別社會責任與企業倫理議題 (Students will understand and be able to identify the ethical considerations of business situations.)

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course is centered on '保險法基礎理論' (Fundamental Theories of Insurance Law) and '責任保險' (Liability insurance), which are fundamental to legal frameworks and strong, accountable institutions.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course covers '再保險案例分析' (Reinsurance case analysis), a mechanism of risk-sharing and partnership within the global insurance industry, and considers '國內外時事' (domestic and international affairs).

gemini_critique.critique: Model A provided more comprehensive evidence and stronger inferences for several SDGs, particularly regarding the broader societal impact of insurance and legal frameworks. My initial analysis was too conservative in some areas.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: Model A correctly highlighted '社會責任與企業倫理議題' as directly relevant to responsible business practices and consumption.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Model A's focus on '保險法基礎理論' and '責任保險' provides a much stronger and more direct link to legal frameworks and institutions.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Model A correctly identified '再保險' (Reinsurance) as a form of partnership and risk-sharing within the global industry.
